item.title: Piece Of Paper
item.caption: This note reads: \'A lethal poison is spreading through your body. You’ll die at 15:00. You'll never find the antidote. -A. B.\'

item.title: Adrenaline Pills
item.caption: These pills help me move a lot faster!

item.title: My Car
item.caption: The nearest hospital is too far away

item.title: My Books
item.caption: A lot of books. I can't use them now...

item.title: My Books
item.caption: There's a book missing! That's how the bookshelf opens

item.title: My Books
item.caption: Yes, the book opened the secret door

item.title: Statue of my wife
item.caption: This is her, a long time ago

item.title: Locked Door
item.caption: Damn it! The door is locked, I need something to open it!

item.title: Locked Door
item.caption: That shot broke the lock. It's opened now

item.title: A Book
item.caption: I wonder how many pages I could read before the poison kills me

item.title: A Book
item.caption: I'm sure this is the book missing in the book shelf
